text: It's hard to believe it was 25 years ago that Disney gifted us with the release of Aladdin. In honor of the anniversary this past weekend, some of the animated classic's stars reminisced on social media. Scott Weinger, the voice of Aladdin, took to Twitter to melt our hearts with a message to Jasmine ( Linda Larkin ). ` ` Hey Princess @ MissLindaLarkin can you believe # Aladdin was released 25 years ago today?'' he wrote. ` ` I'd lie to you about being a prince just to fly you around the world on a Magic Carpet all over again.'' You might also recognize Scott from his role as DJ's love interest Steve on Full House and Fuller House. Getty Images A lot has changed in the
